title: I can't play leage anymore. Is it possible to get old cient back ?
body: No, it is not a 'in game' problem. I can't even enter the game. And even if i somehow do i get stuck in champion select. It would be so nice if you could give us (some of my friedns have this problem too) an old client. Is that possible ?

replies.body: Everyone's transitioned to the updated client, rip the legacy version.  I'm happy to help with whatever issue is going on but I could really use more info.  What's happening exactly?  Are there error messages?  What happens if you enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode?
